alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:44AM MDT until June 29 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 115 AM MDT. * At 1244 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Wiggins, or 19 miles west of Fort Morgan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wiggins and Goodrich around 100 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Weldona. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
